Autosave?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Japanese DS Games Archive: Monster Farm DS 2: Misc. QA (post all new topics here, well make more sections later) : Autosave?
By Bearded Rancher on Monday, March 9, 2009 - 08:42 pm:

I just bought this game today and I was wondering if anyone knew if it has an auto save feature?

I would hate to damage my cartridge by turning off the game at the wrong time.

-Thanks.

By GM on Tuesday, March 10, 2009 - 05:31 am:

There isn't an auto save feature in this game. MFDS2 has a quit function which saves your game at the end of a play session and brings you back to the title screen.

Please note that while shutting off the game without ending a play session won't hurt your save file (though frequent restarts may detrimentally affect the game), it will have an adverse effect on the stats of the monster's offspring when used in combination.
